'''Humbly Enough''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook.

The recipe for Humbly Enough can be obtained from the {{Quest|Receiver of Friends From Afar: Part III}}.

Depending on the quality, Humbly Enough restores '''26'''/'''28'''/'''30'''% of Max HP to the selected character, and regenerates '''450'''/'''620'''/'''790''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
